reroll_restricted_to.description: Restricts the property from randomizing to **At Most** the frequency specified here. For no restrictions, omit this attribute

oneOf.description: Allows disabling the randomization (choosing 'never' for the realm property's reroll option), or randomizing during landblock load ('landblock' reroll option)
Randomization must happen for all fetches for the property (no randomization during landblock load)

min_value.description: The minimum possible value that can exist for this property.

max_value.description: The maximum possible value that can exist for this property.
